level.heading: Application to existing agreements or referrals.
level.text: On or after January 1, 2007, this chapter governs a mediation pursuant to a referral or an agreement to mediate, whenever made.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-87
level.text: For Law 16-87, see notes following ยง 16-4201.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 17 of the Uniform Mediation Act.
